Title: Gear Up
Description:
Hostiles have invaded, our people have been confined in magical stasis, and our creche seems to be collapsing.

This is why we train, $n. When in doubt, fall back to what you know.

First things first. Weapons, armor, supplies. Gather what you can find and get equipped while I marshal our forces.

Then we will locate the Earth-Warder. Surely Neltharion can provide the answers we seek.
RewardText:
This gear is ancient, and the food has turned to dust.

It makes no sense... those rations should have lasted a lifetime.

Well, we will make do with what we have.
